channel.title: PYNQ on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PYNQ on Memo Tut

item.title: AI Edge Contest (Implementation Contest) Tutorial [10: Controlling HW with Python... But...]
item.description: Finally, after a long road, the preparation is over. Let's move the convolution circuit designed with the Ultra96V2 board! Transfer necessary files to Ultra96V2 Created the following files last time (AI Edge Contest (Implementation Contest) Tutorial [9: Until HW synthesis and bitstream generation]) must. pynq_ultra96_conv_l0_r1.bit pynq_ultra96_conv_l0_r1.tcl pynq_ultra96_conv_l0_r1.hdf pynq_ultra96_conv_l0_r1.hwh These files by referring to the 3rd (AI Edge Contest (Implementation Contest) Tutorial [3: Inference with the CPU of Ultra96 board]) On your Ultra96V2 board in /home/xilinx/pynq/overlays/base.
